alert.note: Alert for Yosemite Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 05 at 11:31AM PDT until November 09 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Yosemite Valley. * WHEN...From 4 PM Sunday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Be prepared for winter driving conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches along with blowing snow that could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
